item.description: Question of the day_answers.7-10-2020 Adjective to Adverb Match your answers, adjective to adverb. beautiful - beautifully(add-ly) wonderful - wonderfully(add-ly) pretty - prettily(change y to i, then add-ly) busy - busily(change y to i, then add-ly) comfortable - comfortably(change e to y) reputable - reputably(change e to y) enthusiastic - enthusiastically(add ally) ecstatic - ecstatically(add ally) friendly - in friendly way(use an adverbial phrase)
